title: NBA Defense Week with Steve Jones Jr.
itunes:title: NBA Defense Week with Steve Jones Jr.
description:
Miles and Jack had another legend in the building as they were joined by former assistant coach for the Nets and current Basketball News analyst, Steve Jones Jr. for the NBA’s official Defense Week episode.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
